data.title: Westfield Gym
data.meta_description: Official Bloomingdale Park District web site featuring information and online registration for seasonal programs including preschool and special events, parks, facilities, online brochure, community calendar and so much more.
data.text:
The Westfield Gymnasium is located in Westfield Middle School, 149 Fairfield Way in Bloomingdale. The gym was constructed as part of a cooperative agreement between the Park District and Bloomingdale School District 13.

Walking Track

The Westfield Walking Track is free for residents of Bloomingdale, it consists of two lanes- the inside lane is for walkers and the outside lane is for joggers/runners. You must provide a photo ID to show residency, if you are a non-resident, you must purchase a pass at the Johnston Recreation Center and passes are good for a year.

Hours of Operation begin September 5-December 30

Monday & Tuesday: 5:30am-8am and 4pm-9pm

Wednesday & Thursday: 5:30am-8am and 4pm-9pm

Friday: 5:30am-8am and 4pm-8pm

Saturday: 8am-12pm Sunday: 8am-12pm

*Note* The gym will close by 8:30pm Monday-Thursday and by 7:30pm on Fridays IF there are no attendees
